## ERROR TIPS

### Water source placement errors
- Offshore pumps must be placed directly adjacent to water (max 1 tile away)
- Verify water presence before attempting to place offshore pumps
- Check terrain carefully when placing near water sources

### Boiler placement errors
- Ensure adequate space (2x3 tiles) is available for boiler placement
- Remove existing entities before placing boilers
- Verify boiler orientation matches pipe connections

### API usage errors
- Correctly use nearest() function with proper positional arguments
- Verify function signatures before calling API methods
- Handle error cases when water sources cannot be found

### Power plant construction errors
- Plan power plant locations near reliable water sources
- Clear entire construction area before building
- Verify all components can be placed before starting construction

### Entity removal errors
- Remove connected entities in proper order (pipes first, then machines)
- Verify removal completes successfully before replacement attempts
- Check for remaining entity fragments after removal

### Distance-related errors
- Move within operational range (10 tiles) before interacting with entities
- Verify player position relative to construction targets
- Use intermediate waypoints for distant operations
